notes.text: We no longer display the semantic link if the quick view isn't defined and an app isn't assigned to the user's role
We now ensure the correct order of fields in the Create popup
We now support displaying fields with a fixed value list as radio buttons
We now ensure the avatar is displayed without cropping its sides
We now ensure that the focus on an object page is set to the first mandatory field on small screen devices
We now ensure that the text area label is hidden if it is the only field in a section or subsection
End users can now delete the empty rows of a table
We have resolved an issue with exporting columns added using page variant management in a list report with multiple views
We now correctly update the headerLevel property value when a section or subsection title is merged with the control title
We now ensure that the title does not overlap with global actions on the object page
